blockStates.name: Word Cloud
blockStates.userText:
A word cloud is a visual representation
of textual data, typically used to depict 
the relative importance of the words in
the text. The importance of a word is 
approximated by the frequency in 
which it appears in the text.

The importance of a word is often
represented by its size and/or color. 

You can use a String Input Block to
create (or copy and paste) text and
then output it to a Word Cloud Block
for visualization. You can select a
few alignment methods and set
words to exclude. There are also 
many coloring options for you to
choose.

blockStates.name: Note
blockStates.userText:
The word "importance" is excluded from this 
word cloud.
